name: MIS Earnings for the Day Report
description:
Is in the form of a certificate to be printed and signed by the earnings clerk to verify entries made in ledgers.
FIN0010 - v00.00.07 Last Modified: 26-Nov-2012

dataset.name: Earnings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'BONUS' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'BONUS' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS BONUS_AMOUNT_WITH_HINT_, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS ACCOUNT_TRANSACTION_AMOUNTS_36, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADJ' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADJ' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS LOSS_OF_EARNINGS, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('08-06-2010 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) GROUP BY AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT BONUS_AMOUNT_WITH_HINT_, DAY_DATE, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, ADVANCE_AMOUNT, REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT, ACCOUNT_TRANSACTION_AMOUNTS_36, LOSS_OF_EARNINGS, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, ACCOUNT_TRANSACTION_AMOUNTS.EARNINGS || BONUS_AMOUNT_WITH_HINT_ || ADVANCE_AMOUNT AS V_TOTAL, V_TOTAL || REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT || LOSS_OF_EARNINGS AS V_NET_AMOUNT_FROM_SUBHEAD FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS MIS_LOAD_LOG_LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT MIS_LOAD_LOG_LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Establishment Name
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT WHERE (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_TOTAL
field.legacySql: =[Account Transaction Amounts].[Earnings] + [Bonus Amount with HINT (FIN0010)] + [Advance Amount]

field.name: $ref:V_NET_AMOUNT_FROM_SUBHEAD
field.display: Net amount required from earnings subhead

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
